meanings.definition: The quality or state of being an expert.
meanings.sent1: Her expertness in painting was evident from the intricate details in her artwork.
meanings.sent2: His expertness in chess allowed him to win the tournament effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of expertness in cooking, he attempted to make a gourmet meal for his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her expertness in navigating through the busy city streets was like a well-trained GPS system.
meanings.sent5: The expertness of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Skill or knowledge in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The expertness of the mechanic was evident as he quickly fixed the car engine.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated her expertness in mathematics by solving the complex equations with ease.
meanings.sent3: His lack of expertness in fishing led to him catching an old boot instead of a fish.
meanings.sent4: The expertness of the detective in solving mysteries was unmatched in the city.
meanings.sent5: The expertness of the chef in creating delicious dishes attracted customers from far and wide.
